name: SurfaceModel
description: Creates Beams and joint rules from a planar brep surface.

inputParameters.name: mesh
inputParameters.description: Mesh whose edges are used to generate beams.

inputParameters.name: category
inputParameters.description: category assigned to beams that can be used to define joint rules.

outputParameters.name: beam map
outputParameters.description: a Data Tree with the beams organized by connection to a mesh vertex. Used to define joint rules using the Joint_Rules_From_List component.

outputParameters.name: blanks
outputParameters.description: base beam geometry before adding features or joining operations
